Package report

Class SnapshotReport

java.lang.Object
report.Report
report.SnapshotReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
UpdateListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnergyLevelReport, LocationSnapshotReport
public abstract class SnapshotReport extends Report implements UpdateListener
Node snapshot report superclass. Reports some characteristic of all (or only some, see REPORTED_NODES) nodes every configurable-amount-of seconds (see GRANULARITY).
